trans-unit.source: Contains detailed information about input that was recognized by instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" />.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações detalhadas sobre a entrada que foi reconhecida por instâncias do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: This class derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and provides detailed information about speech recognition, including the following:
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é derivada de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> e fornece informações detalhadas sobre o reconhecimento de fala, incluindo o seguinte:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Grammar%2A> property references the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> that the recognizer used to identify the speech.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Grammar%2A> referências de propriedade de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> que o identificador usado para identificar a fala.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Text%2A> property contains the normalized text for the phrase.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Text%2A> propriedade contém o texto normalizado da frase.

trans-unit.source: For more information about text normalization, see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a normalização do texto, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> property references the semantic information contained in the result.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> propriedade faz referência as informações semânticas contidas no resultado.

trans-unit.source: The semantic information is a dictionary of the key names and associated semantic data.
trans-unit.target: As informações de semânticas serão um dicionário de nomes de chave de dados semânticos associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property contains a collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objects that represent other candidate interpretations of the audio input.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> propriedade contém uma coleção de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objetos que representam outros interpretações de candidato de entrada de áudio.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> for additional information.
trans-unit.target: Para saber mais, confira <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A> property contains an ordered collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> objects that represent each recognized word in the input.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A> propriedade contém uma coleção ordenada de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> reconhecido de objetos que representam cada palavra na entrada.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> contains display format, lexical format, and pronunciation information for the corresponding word.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> contém formato de exibição, formato lexical e informações de pronúncia da palavra correspondente.

trans-unit.source: Certain members of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> classes can generate a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: Alguns membros do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> classes podem gerar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the following methods and events.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte os seguintes métodos e eventos.

trans-unit.source: Methods and events of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> class:
trans-unit.target: Métodos e eventos de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classe:

trans-unit.source: Methods and events of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> class:
trans-unit.target: Métodos e eventos de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classe:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> evento o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information about recognition events, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre eventos de reconhecimento, consulte [usando eventos de reconhecimento de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a handler for the `SpeechRecognized` event of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object, and some of the information about the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um manipulador para o `SpeechRecognized` eventos de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> objeto e algumas informações sobre associado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of possible matches for input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de possíveis correspondências para a entrada para o reconhecedor de fala.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the recognition alternates.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção somente leitura de alternativas de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: Recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> are ordered by the values of their <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Reconhecimento de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> são ordenados por valores de seus <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The confidence value of a given phrase indicates the probability that the phrase matches the input.
trans-unit.target: O valor de confiança de uma determinada expressão indica a probabilidade de que a frase corresponde à entrada.

trans-unit.source: The phrase with the highest confidence value is the phrase that most likely matches the input.
trans-unit.target: A frase com o valor mais alto de confiança é a frase que provavelmente corresponde à entrada.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> value should be evaluated individually and without reference to the confidence values of other <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> valor deve ser avaliado individualmente e sem referência para os valores de confiança dos outros <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The properties that the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> inherits from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> provide detailed information about the phrase with the highest confidence score.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades que o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> herda de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> fornecem informações detalhadas sobre a frase com a pontuação de confiança mais alta.

trans-unit.source: One use for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> collection is for automated error correction.
trans-unit.target: Um uso de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> coleção destina-se a correção de erros automatizada.

trans-unit.source: For example, when designing a directory dialog, an application could prompt the user to check if the application has the correct information from a recognition event, as in, "Did you say 'Anna'?" If the user says "no", then the application could query the user about any alternates that had a high enough <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> score.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, ao criar uma caixa de diálogo de diretório, um aplicativo pode solicitar ao usuário para verificar se o aplicativo tem as informações corretas de um evento de reconhecimento, como em "você disse 'Anna'?" Se o usuário diz "não", o aplicativo pode consultar o usuário sobre quaisquer alternativas que tinha um alto o suficiente <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> pontuação.

trans-unit.source: For more information about speech recognition and the use of recognition alternates, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o reconhecimento de fala e o uso de reconhecimento de alternativas, consulte [o reconhecimento de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) e [usando eventos de reconhecimento de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a handler for the `SpeechRecognized` event and some of the information about the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um manipulador para o `SpeechRecognized` evento e algumas informações sobre associado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o áudio associado com o resultado de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The audio associated with the recognition result or <see langword="null" /> if the recognizer generated the result from a call to the <see langword="EmulateRecognize" /> or <see langword="EmulateRecognizeAsync" /> methods of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: O áudio associado com o resultado de reconhecimento ou <see langword="null" /> se o reconhecedor gerado o resultado de uma chamada para o <see langword="EmulateRecognize" /> ou <see langword="EmulateRecognizeAsync" /> métodos de um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> instância.

trans-unit.source: To get a section of the audio that is associated with a specific range of words in the recognition result, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma seção de áudio que está associado um intervalo específico de palavras no resultado de reconhecimento, use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a handler for the **SpeechRecognized** event and some of the information about the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um manipulador para o **SpeechRecognized** evento e algumas informações sobre associado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.

trans-unit.source: The first word in the range.
trans-unit.target: A primeira palavra no intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The last word in the range.
trans-unit.target: A última palavra no intervalo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a section of the audio that is associated with a specific range of words in the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma seção do áudio que está associada um intervalo específico de palavras no resultado de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The section of audio associated with the word range.
trans-unit.target: A seção de áudio associada ao intervalo de palavras.

trans-unit.source: To get the complete audio associated with the recognition result, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o áudio completo associado ao resultado de reconhecimento, use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar to accept name input and attaches to it a handler for the `SpeechRecognized` event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria uma gramática para aceitar a entrada de nome e anexa a ele um manipulador para o `SpeechRecognized` evento.

trans-unit.source: The grammar uses a wildcard for the name element of the phrase.
trans-unit.target: A gramática usa um caractere curinga para o elemento de nome da frase.

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the audio from the wildcard to create and play a greeting prompt.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos usa o áudio de caractere curinga para criar e executar um prompt de saudação.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer generated the result from a call to <see langword="EmulateRecognize" /> or <see langword="EmulateRecognizeAsync" /> methods of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor gerou o resultado de uma chamada para os métodos <see langword="EmulateRecognize" /> ou <see langword="EmulateRecognizeAsync" /> dos objetos <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser preenchido com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino da serialização.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Popula uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>.
